section.5: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Ubadah bin Samit that he heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say:“No one prostrates to Allah but Allah will record one Hasanah (good reward) for him, and will erase thereby one bad deed and raise him in status one degree. So prostrate a great deal.”
